snippet: Investors are eagerly awaiting an initial public offering from Facebook, but otherwise they are still recovering from a tepid market in 2011.
abstract: Investors are eagerly awaiting an initial public offering from Facebook, but otherwise they are still recovering from a tepid market in 2011.
lead_paragraph: It will take more than Facebook to heat up the tepid market for initial public offerings.

headline.main: Facebook Aside, Market for I.P.O.'s Stays Cool
